awards.title: Second Place, Fundace Monograph Prize
awards.summary: Received second place for the undergraduate thesis titled 'Fiscal Multipliers: The Impact of Government Spending and Taxation on Inflation and Output'. The thesis was guided by Prof. Roseli Basso-Silva and focused on econometric analysis and economic impact assessment.

projects.name: Fiscal Multipliers: The Impact of Government Spending and Taxation
projects.summary: Conducted econometric analysis to estimate fiscal multipliers in Brazil, examining their effects on short-term inflation and production, as well as long-term economic potential.
highlights: Applied advanced econometric techniques including time series analysis, VAR (Vector Autoregression), VEC (Vector Error Correction), and Bayesian methods for comprehensive analysis.
